queries.users_link: SELECT TELEGRAM_LINK FROM USERS WHERE TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.searching_admins: SELECT * FROM ADMINISTRATORS INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID
queries.user_id: SELECT ID FROM USERS WHERE TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.admin_id: SELECT ID FROM ADMINISTRATORS WHERE USER_ID = ?
queries.adding_user: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO USERS (FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, TELEGRAM_ID, TELEGRAM_LINK) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
queries.get_balance: SELECT BALANCE FROM USERS WHERE TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.save_lot: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO LOTS (ADMIN_ID, TITLE, GEOLOCATION, START_PRICE, DESCRIPTION, ADDITIONAL_INFO) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
queries.lot_id: SELECT ID FROM LOTS WHERE ADMIN_ID = ?
queries.lot_title: SELECT TITLE FROM LOTS WHERE ID = ?
queries.lot_id_title: SELECT LOTS.ID, TITLE FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE USERS.TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.lot_id_title-winners: SELECT LOTS.ID, LOTS.TITLE FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID INNER JOIN WINNERS ON LOTS.ID = WINNERS.LOT_ID WHERE LOTS.STATUS = 'UNSELLED' AND USERS.TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.lot_sellers_link: SELECT TELEGRAM_LINK FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOT.ID = ?
queries.lot_upload_links: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO LINKS (LOT_ID, LINK) values (?, ?)
queries.get_lot_info: SELECT LOTS.TITLE, LOTS.START_PRICE, LOTS.GEOLOCATION, LOTS.DESCRIPTION, LOTS.ADDITIONAL_INFO, USERS.TELEGRAM_LINK FROM LOTS INNER JOIN LINKS ON LOTS.ID = LINKS.LOT_ID INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOTS.ID = ?
queries.get_images_link: SELECT LINK FROM LINKS WHERE LOT_ID = ?
queries.get_lot_price: SELECT START_PRICE FROM LOTS WHERE ID = ?
queries.insert_bid_to_lot: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO BIDS (LOT_ID, USER_ID, BID_AMOUNT, BID_DATE) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
queries.get_bid_id: SELECT ID FROM BIDS WHERE USER_ID = ? AND BID_AMOUNT = ?
queries.set_winner: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO WINNERS (USER_ID, LOT_ID, BID_ID) values (?, ?, ?)
queries.get_bids_by_lot: SELECT TELEGRAM_LINK, BID_AMOUNT, BID_DATE FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID INNER JOIN BIDS ON BIDS.LOT_ID = LOTS.ID WHERE LOTS.ID = ?
queries.get_selled_lots: SELECT TITLE FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOTS.STATUS = SELLED AND USERS.TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.get_unselled_lots: SELECT LOTS.ID, TITLE FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOTS.STATUS = 'UNSELLED' AND USERS.TELEGRAM_ID = ?
queries.get_tg-id_by_lot-id: SELECT TELEGRAM_ID FROM LOTS INNER JOIN ADMINISTRATORS ON LOTS.ADMIN_ID = ADMINISTRATORS.ID INNER JOIN USERS ON ADMINISTRATORS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOTS.ID = ?
queries.get_winners_link: SELECT TELEGRAM_LINK FROM WINNERS INNER JOIN USERS ON WINNERS.USER_ID = USERS.ID WHERE LOT_ID = ?
queries.get_winners_id: SELECT USER_ID FROM WINNERS WHERE LOT_ID = ?
